featured.text: He did not take the elevator, however.
Elderly shoppers in this store are advised to take the elevator rather than the _____, which may move too fast for them to keep their balance.
capacity of this elevator is 400 kilograms.

definition.zh_def: 電梯：用於在建築物內部運送人或貨物的機械裝置。
definition.en_def: A device used for transporting people or goods vertically within a building.
definition.example: She took the elevator to the top floor of the building.
